alert.note: Alert for Newton; Rockdale; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 7:44AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Rockdale, Walton and Newton Counties through 815 AM EDT... At 743 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Rocky Plains, or near Covington, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Conyers, Monroe, Covington, Loganville, Social Circle, Oxford, Porterdale, Walnut Grove, Mansfield, Between, Good Hope, Jersey, Georgia International Horse Park, Stewart, Nicholasville, Big Haynes Creek Park, Pannell, Oak Hill, Ebenezer and Magnet. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
